prayers.title: Opening Prayer
prayers.content: Almighty God, as we gather in unity and fellowship, we seek your guidance and blessings. Grant us wisdom, courage, and compassion in all our endeavors.

prayers.title: Closing Prayer
prayers.content: Thank you for this time of fellowship and learning. May we carry the lessons and spirit of our gathering into the world, serving others with integrity and excellence.

prayers.title: Prayer for the Sick
prayers.content: We lift up to you those among us who are facing health challenges. Grant them swift recovery, comfort, and the strength to endure.
